bug.author: WangLanxiao
bug.summary: view_log error:can't multiply sequence by non-int of type 'float'
bug.description: When I follow the voc examples, I got problems of visualizing the logs in command ./view_log logs/XXX/log.csv with error can't multiply sequence by non-int of type 'float'

comments.comment: I met the same problem. Did you solve it?

I met the same problem. Did you solve it?
I still can't solve it.
Sometimes the loss can be inf or nan. Maybe that's the reason why you have this error.

Sometimes the loss can be inf or nan. Maybe that's the reason why you have this error.
I agree with you. And I find nan in log.csv. Could you tell me how can I solve it?
I reproduced this error on my env with Python3. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wkentaro/pytorch-fcn/pull/102>#102</denchmark-link> fixes this error.
